title: [Bug] Private git downloads broken
body:
@tgamblin @adamjstewart 

I have a package `modele` sitting on a git server that requires authentication to login.  I've set up this authentication via SSH in my `.ssh/` directory.  My `package.py` file states:

```
    version('landice',
        git='simplex.giss.nasa.gov:/giss/gitrepo/modelE.git',
        branch='landice')
```

I can do `simplex.giss.nasa.gov:/giss/gitrepo/modelE.git` just fine.  However, when Spack tries to download, the git server asks me for a password (see below)?  Any ideas on what's happening?  I haven't yet been able to  debug this due to #1568.
